  <script type="text/javascript">
   (function() {
              var host = 'wsws.org';
              var element = document.createElement('script');
              var firstScript = document.getElementsByTagName('script')[0];
              var url = 'https://quantcast.mgr.consensu.org'
                .concat('/choice/', 'JH3fNnZC0zWt-', '/', host, '/choice.js')
              var uspTries = 0;
              var uspTriesLimit = 3;
              element.async = true;
              element.type = 'text/javascript';
              element.src = url;

              firstScript.parentNode.insertBefore(element, firstScript);

              function makeStub() {
                var TCF_LOCATOR_NAME = '__tcfapiLocator';
                var queue = [];
                var win = window;
                var cmpFrame;

                function addFrame() {
                  var doc = win.document;
                  var otherCMP = !!(win.frames[TCF_LOCATOR_NAME]);

                  if (!otherCMP) {
                    if (doc.body) {
                      var iframe = doc.createElement('iframe');

                      iframe.style.cssText = 'display:none';
                      iframe.name = TCF_LOCATOR_NAME;
                      doc.body.appendChild(iframe);
                    } else {
                      setTimeout(addFrame, 5);
                    }
                  }
                  return !otherCMP;
                }

                function tcfAPIHandler() {
                  var gdprApplies;
                  var args = arguments;

                  if (!args.length) {
                    return queue;
                  } else if (args[0] === 'setGdprApplies') {
                    if (
                      args.length > 3 &&
                      args[2] === 2 &&
                      typeof args[3] === 'boolean'
                    ) {
                      gdprApplies = args[3];
                      if (typeof args[2] === 'function') {
                        args[2]('set', true);
                      }
                    }
                  } else if (args[0] === 'ping') {
                    var retr = {
                      gdprApplies: gdprApplies,
                      cmpLoaded: false,
                      cmpStatus: 'stub'
                    };

                    if (typeof args[2] === 'function') {
                      args[2](retr);
                    }
                  } else {
                    queue.push(args);
                  }
                }

                function postMessageEventHandler(event) {
                  var msgIsString = typeof event.data === 'string';
                  var json = {};

                  try {
                    if (msgIsString) {
                      json = JSON.parse(event.data);
                    } else {
                      json = event.data;
                    }
                  } catch (ignore) {}

                  var payload = json.__tcfapiCall;

                  if (payload) {
                    window.__tcfapi(
                      payload.command,
                      payload.version,
                      function(retValue, success) {
                        var returnMsg = {
                          __tcfapiReturn: {
                            returnValue: retValue,
                            success: success,
                            callId: payload.callId
                          }
                        };
                        if (msgIsString) {
                          returnMsg = JSON.stringify(returnMsg);
                        }
                        event.source.postMessage(returnMsg, '*');
                      },
                      payload.parameter
                    );
                  }
                }

                while (win) {
                  try {
                    if (win.frames[TCF_LOCATOR_NAME]) {
                      cmpFrame = win;
                      break;
                    }
                  } catch (ignore) {}

                  if (win === window.top) {
                    break;
                  }
                  win = win.parent;
                }
                if (!cmpFrame) {
                  addFrame();
                  win.__tcfapi = tcfAPIHandler;
                  win.addEventListener('message', postMessageEventHandler, false);
                }
              };

              makeStub();

              var uspStubFunction = function() {
                var arg = arguments;
                if (typeof window.__uspapi !== uspStubFunction) {
                  setTimeout(function() {
                    if (typeof window.__uspapi !== 'undefined') {
                      window.__uspapi.apply(window.__uspapi, arg);
                    }
                  }, 500);
                }
              };

              var checkIfUspIsReady = function() {
                uspTries++;
                if (window.__uspapi === uspStubFunction && uspTries < uspTriesLimit) {
                  console.warn('USP is not accessible');
                } else {
                  clearInterval(uspInterval);
                }
              };

              if (typeof window.__uspapi === 'undefined') {
                window.__uspapi = uspStubFunction;
                var uspInterval = setInterval(checkIfUspIsReady, 6000);
              }
              })();
  </script>

             <div class="relative pv3 ph3 tc">
              <h2 class="balance-text avenir f4 f4-ns f3-l lh-title measure ma0 center">
               <a class="black _hover-black-70 _bg-white no-underline underline-hover" href="/en/articles/2021/03/18/pers-m18.html" style="transition:color 0.5s">
                <span class="">
                 150 years since the Paris Commune
                </span>
               </a>
              </h2>
              <p class="balance-text avenir f6 lh-short lh-copy-ns measure mv3 center">
               On March 18, 1871, the armed working class districts of Paris rose up and established the first workers state in world history, the Paris Commune.
              </p>
             </div>
            </div>

              <div class="_pr3 _w-two-thirds-ns">
               <h4 class="_balance-text avenir f6 normal black-60 lh-title ma0 mb2 truncate">
                <span class="pv1">
                 Book review
                </span>
               </h4>
               <h2 class="_balance-text avenir lh-title measure ma0 f5 f4-m _f5-ns">
                <a class="black _hover-black-70 _bg-white no-underline underline-hover" href="/en/articles/2021/03/18/horn-m18.html" style="transition:color 0.5s">
                 <span class="">
                  Gerald Horne’s counter-revolution against 1776
                 </span>
                </a>
               </h2>
               <p class="_balance-text avenir f6 lh-short lh-copy-ns measure-wide mv3">
                A careful review reveals that Horne’s
                <em>
                 The Counter-Revolution of 1776
                </em>
                is, in large measure, a work of fiction.
               </p>
              </div>
             </div>
             <div class="black-50 pb3 _bb b--black-10 mt2 mt0-m">
              <span class="avenir f7 lh-title date">
               <span>
                Fred Schleger
               </span>
               <span class="dib mh1">

                </time>
               </span>
              </span>
             </div>
            </article>
            <article class="cf pt3 bt b--black-10">
             <div class="_flex-ns _flex-row-reverse-ns">
              <div class="fr w-40 ml3 mb3">

                 </figure>
                </a>
               </div>
              </div>
              <div class="_pr3 _w-two-thirds-ns">
               <h2 class="_balance-text avenir lh-title measure ma0 f5 f4-m _f5-ns">
                <a class="black _hover-black-70 _bg-white no-underline underline-hover" href="/en/articles/2021/03/19/pers-m19.html" style="transition:color 0.5s">
                 <span class="">
                  Biden administration distorts science to reopen US schools
                 </span>
                </a>
               </h2>
               <p class="_balance-text avenir f6 lh-short lh-copy-ns measure-wide mv3">
                The ruling class campaign to reopen schools and the broader economy across the US and globally is deepening each day, in tandem with growing efforts to distort science to suit this political agenda.
               </p>
              </div>
             </div>
             <div class="black-50 pb3 _bb b--black-10 mt2 mt0-m">
              <span class="avenir f7 lh-title date">
               <span>
                Evan Blake

     <a class="no-underline pointer" href="/en/topics/event/coronavirus">
      <section class="bg-black-05 pv3 pt4-m mt4 ph3 ph4-m" data-content-name="Frontpage ad to /en/topics/event/coronavirus" data-content-piece="/en" data-track-content="true">
       <div class="mw6 mw-75rem-m center pa2 cf flex-m items-center">
        <div class="w-100 w-40-m w-40-l">
         <div class="center">
          <div>
           <figure class="relative ma0 overflow-hidden">
            <div class="relative overflow-hidden">
             <img class="db relative center" src="https://www.wsws.org/asset/4e920eb5-4c78-473d-92de-254e555e3a1a?rendition=image1280"/>
            </div>
           </figure>
          </div>
         </div>
        </div>
        <div class="w-100 pl4-m pl5-l mt0-m mt2 w-60-m w-60-l">
         <div class="db f3 f2-l b -ttu lh-title ma0 mt2 georgia">
          <span type="text-line">
           One year of the coronavirus pandemic
          </span>
         </div>
         <div class="avenir f5 f4-l black-70 lh-title mt3">
          <div type="text-block">
           <p>
            March 11 marks one year since the World Health Organization declared COVID-19 a global pandemic. We are republishing below statements and articles from the WSWS analyzing the response to the pandemic and calling for emergency measures to contain it.
           </p>
          </div>
         </div>
         <div class="tc tl-m">
          <div class="b white bg-black dib ph3 pv3 avenir tracked-half grow ttu f6 f5-l bw1 bn br2 no-underline mt3">
           Read more
          </div>
         </div>
        </div>
       </div>
      </section>
     </a>
     <section class="featured mt3 mt4-ns mt5-xl ph3 ph4-m" style="background:#fff">
      <div class="mw6 _mw9-m mw-75rem-m center">
       <div class="dn-ns">
        <div class="bb b--black-10 nl3 nl0-ns nr3 nr0-ns">
        </div>
        <div class="bg-black-05 bb bw1 nl3 nl0-ns nr3 nr0-ns" style='background-image:url("/static/img/border_diagonal.png");background-repeat:repeat;background-position:0px top'>
         <div class="pb3 bg-white-70">
         </div>
        </div>
       </div>
       <div class="bb b--black-10 pb4 _ph3 _ph0-ns _ph4-m">
        <div class="pa2 pa0-ns">
         <style>

                              max-height: 0;

           <article class="flex flex-column justify-between pb3 pb4-l">

             <a class="pointer" href="/en/articles/2020/02/28/pers-f28.html">

               </div>
              </figure>
             </a>
             <div class="relative pv3 ph3 tc">
              <h2 class="balance-text avenir f4 f4-ns f3-l lh-title measure ma0 center">
               <a class="black _hover-black-70 _bg-white no-underline underline-hover" href="/en/articles/2020/02/28/pers-f28.html" style="transition:color 0.5s">
                <span class="">
                 For a globally coordinated emergency response to the coronavirus pandemic!
                </span>
               </a>
              </h2>
              <p class="balance-text avenir f6 lh-short lh-copy-ns measure mv3 center">
               Vast resources must be immediately mobilized to contain the spread of the disease, treat and care for those who are infected, and secure the livelihoods of the hundreds of millions of people who will be affected by the economic fallout.
              </p>
             </div>
            </div>
            <div class="black-50 pb3 _bb b--black-10 tc">
             <span class="avenir f7 lh-title date">
              <span>
               International Committee of the Fourth International

               </time>

              <div class="_pr3 _w-two-thirds-ns">
               <h4 class="_balance-text avenir f6 normal black-60 lh-title ma0 mb2 truncate">
                <span class="pv1">
                 The coronavirus pandemic crisis intensifies
                </span>
               </h4>
               <h2 class="_balance-text avenir lh-title measure ma0 f5 f4-m _f5-ns">
                <a class="black _hover-black-70 _bg-white no-underline underline-hover" href="/en/articles/2020/03/13/pers-m13.html" style="transition:color 0.5s">
                 <span class="">
                  Capitalism is at war with society
                 </span>
                </a>
               </h2>
               <p class="_balance-text avenir f6 lh-short lh-copy-ns measure-wide mv3">
                The spread of the coronavirus has exposed the disastrous consequences of decades of the massive concentration of wealth and inequality spawned by capitalism.
               </p>

              </span>

      <section class="bg-black-05 pv3 pt4-m mt4 ph3 ph4-m" data-content-name="Frontpage ad to /en/articles/2021/03/08/luxe-m08.html" data-content-piece="/en" data-track-content="true">
       <div class="mw6 mw-75rem-m center pa2 cf flex-m items-center">
        <div class="w-100 w-40-m w-50-l">
         <div class="center">
          <div>
           <figure class="relative ma0 overflow-hidden">
            <div class="relative overflow-hidden">
             <img class="db relative center" src="https://www.wsws.org/asset/fad1d3fd-6ebf-4b00-872a-9662ba60d64e?rendition=image1280"/>
            </div>
           </figure>
          </div>
         </div>
        </div>
        <div class="w-100 pl4-m pl5-l mt0-m mt2 w-60-m w-50-l">
         <div class="db f3 f2-l b -ttu lh-title ma0 mt2 georgia">
          <span type="text-line">
           150 years since the birth of Rosa Luxemburg
          </span>
         </div>
         <div class="avenir f5 f4-l black-70 lh-title mt3">
          <div type="text-block">
           <p>
            The meeting examined Luxemburg’s role as a Marxist theoretician and political leader, and discussed the significance of her legacy to the contemporary struggle to build a Marxist leadership.
           </p>
          </div>
         </div>
         <div class="tc tl-m">
          <div class="b white bg-black dib ph3 pv3 avenir tracked-half grow ttu f6 f5-l bw1 bn br2 no-underline mt3">

     </a>
     <section class="custom-topic mt3 mt4-ns mt5-xl ph3 ph4-m" style="background:#fff">
      <div class="mw6 _mw9-m mw-75rem-m center">
       <div class="dn-ns">
        <div class="bb b--black-10 nl3 nl0-ns nr3 nr0-ns">
        </div>
        <div class="bg-black-05 bb bw1 nl3 nl0-ns nr3 nr0-ns" style='background-image:url("/static/img/border_diagonal.png");background-repeat:repeat;background-position:0px top'>
         <div class="pb3 bg-white-70">
         </div>
        </div>
       </div>
       <div class="ph3 ph0-ns nl3 nl0-ns nr3 nr0-ns _ph4-m bb b--black-10 bn-ns mb3 mb0-m">
        <div class="dn db-ns dn-m bt bw1 mb2">
        </div>
        <div class="">
         <div class="w-100 bt-m bw2">
         </div>
        </div>
        <div class="relative cf avenir ph2 ph0-ns">
         <div class="" style="max-width:80%">
          <div class="dib pt3 pb3 pt0-ns pb3-ns pt3-m pb4-m _bt bw2">
           <a class="dib f7 f4-m f3-m f3-l b black lh-title ttu tracked-half no-underline pointer _pt3 _bt bw3" href="/en/topics/site_area/workers">
            Global class struggle
           </a>
           <ul class="dn db-m list pl0 ma0">
            <li class="dib avenir mr3">
             <a class="dib f6 black lh-title _hover-black-70 pt2 no-underline underline-hover" href="/en/topics/workersCategory/na-auto">
              Autoworkers
             </a>
            </li>
            <li class="dib avenir mr3">
             <a class="dib f6 black lh-title _hover-black-70 pt2 no-underline underline-hover" href="/en/topics/healthCategory/US_Healthcare">
              Healthcare
             </a>
            </li>
            <li class="dib avenir mr3">
             <a class="dib f6 black lh-title _hover-black-70 pt2 no-underline underline-hover" href="/en/topics/educationCategory/Education-US">
              Education
             </a>
            </li>
            <li class="dib avenir mr3">

             <div class="relative pv3 ph3 tc">
              <h2 class="balance-text avenir f4 f4-ns f3-l lh-title measure ma0 center">
               <a class="black _hover-black-70 _bg-white no-underline underline-hover" href="/en/articles/2021/03/20/mass-m20.html" style="transition:color 0.5s">
                <span class="">
                 Pandemic threatens to explode in Massachusetts as Baker administration forces schools open
                </span>
               </a>
              </h2>
              <p class="balance-text avenir f6 lh-short lh-copy-ns measure mv3 center">
               Governor Baker’s unelected board voted to give Department of Elementary and Secondary Education Commissioner Jeff Riley “full power of the law” to force open all state school districts amid dangers of a new surge.
              </p>

              </div>
              <div class="_pr3 _w-two-thirds-ns">
               <h2 class="_balance-text avenir lh-title measure ma0 f5 f4-m _f5-ns">
                <a class="black _hover-black-70 _bg-white no-underline underline-hover" href="/en/articles/2021/03/20/oned-m20.html" style="transition:color 0.5s">
                 <span class="">
                  Dozens of Ontario schools forced to close, as government’s “open school” policy endangers lives
                 </span>
                </a>
               </h2>
               <p class="_balance-text avenir f6 lh-short lh-copy-ns measure-wide mv3">
                In the latest tragic incident produced by the government’s insistence on in-person learning, five teachers at a Peel Region elementary school have been sickened by the virus, with one now in a coma.
               </p>

               </div>

              <div class="_pr3 _w-two-thirds-ns">
               <h2 class="_balance-text avenir lh-title measure ma0 f5 f4-m _f5-ns">
                <a class="black _hover-black-70 _bg-white no-underline underline-hover" href="/en/articles/2021/03/20/phil-m20.html" style="transition:color 0.5s">
                 <span class="">
                  Philadelphia school closed for COVID outbreak 10 days after reopening
                 </span>
                </a>
               </h2>
               <p class="_balance-text avenir f6 lh-short lh-copy-ns measure-wide mv3">
                Since reopening schools earlier this month, the city of Philadelphia has seen a 16 percent increase in the 7-day average of new infections.
               </p>

                </a>

               <h2 class="_balance-text avenir lh-title measure ma0 f5 f4-m _f5-ns">
                <a class="black _hover-black-70 _bg-white no-underline underline-hover" href="/en/articles/2021/03/20/wcrf-m22.html" style="transition:color 0.5s">

                </a>

                The efforts of the politicians and teachers unions across the West Coast to return students and staff to schools under deadly conditions must be resisted in order to save lives.
               </p>
              </div>

             <div class="black-50 pb3 _bb b--black-10 mt2 _mt0-m">

       <div class="dn-ns">

        </div>

          </span>

              <h2 class="balance-text avenir f4 f4-ns f3-l lh-title measure ma0 center">

              <p class="balance-text avenir f6 lh-short lh-copy-ns measure mv3 center">

          </div>
          <div class="w-100 w-two-thirds-l flex-m bt bt-0-l bl-l b--black-10 pt3 pt0-l pl3-l pl4-xxl mt3 mt0-l">
           <div class="w-100 w-two-thirds-m pr3-m pr4-xxl">
            <article class="cf pt3 pt0-ns bt bn-ns b--black-10">
             <div class="_flex-ns _flex-row-reverse-ns">
              <div class="fr w-40 ml3 mb3">
               <div class="w-100 aspect-ratio aspect-ratio--16x9">
                <a class="pointer" href="/en/articles/2021/03/19/unem-m19.html">
                 <figure class="aspect-ratio--object bg-black ma0 overflow-hidden">
                  <img class="db h-100 center" loading="lazy" src="https://www.wsws.org/asset/c4306358-644e-4739-965e-002c9d637a8b?rendition=image640"/>
                 </figure>
                </a>
               </div>
              </div>
              <div class="_pr3 _w-two-thirds-ns">
               <h2 class="_balance-text avenir lh-title measure ma0 f5 f4-m _f5-ns">
                <a class="black _hover-black-70 _bg-white no-underline underline-hover" href="/en/articles/2021/03/19/unem-m19.html" style="transition:color 0.5s">
                 <span class="">
                  Another 770,000 new U.S. unemployment claims filed as unprecedented job losses continue one year into pandemic
                 </span>
                </a>
               </h2>
               <p class="_balance-text avenir f6 lh-short lh-copy-ns measure-wide mv3">
                Over 81 million jobless claims have been filed since March of last year, a figure nearly seven times the yearly average, with no historical precedent or end in sight.
               </p>
              </div>
             </div>
             <div class="black-50 pb3 _bb b--black-10 mt2 mt0-m">
              <span class="avenir f7 lh-title date">
               <span>
                Jacob Crosse
               </span>
               <span class="dib mh1">
                •
               </span>
               <span class="dib">
                <time datetime="2021-03-19T03:00:15.000Z">
                 18 March 2021
                </time>
               </span>
              </span>
             </div>
            </article>
            <article class="cf pt3 bt b--black-10">
             <div class="_flex-ns _flex-row-reverse-ns">
              <div class="fr w-40 ml3 mb3">
               <div class="w-100 aspect-ratio aspect-ratio--16x9">
                <a class="pointer" href="/en/articles/2021/03/19/opca-m19.html">
                 <figure class="aspect-ratio--object bg-black ma0 overflow-hidden">
                  <img class="db h-100 center" loading="lazy" src="https://www.wsws.org/asset/c7290921-acc2-4e42-a812-79132120eae7?rendition=image640"/>
                 </figure>
                </a>
               </div>
              </div>
              <div class="_pr3 _w-two-thirds-ns">
               <h2 class="_balance-text avenir lh-title measure ma0 f5 f4-m _f5-ns">
                <a class="black _hover-black-70 _bg-white no-underline underline-hover" href="/en/articles/2021/03/19/opca-m19.html" style="transition:color 0.5s">
                 <span class="">
                  Opioid-related deaths skyrocket in Canada as pandemic worsens already dire health care and social crisis
                 </span>
                </a>
               </h2>
               <p class="_balance-text avenir f6 lh-short lh-copy-ns measure-wide mv3">
                Virtually every province recorded increases in opioid-related deaths in 2020, with the number of fatalities in British Columbia almost doubling to 1,716.
               </p>
              </div>
             </div>
             <div class="black-50 pb3 _bb b--black-10 mt2 mt0-m">
              <span class="avenir f7 lh-title date">

                 </figure>
                </a>
               </div>

              <div class="_pr3 _w-two-thirds-ns">
               <h2 class="_balance-text avenir lh-title measure ma0 f5 f4-m _f5-ns">
                <a class="black _hover-black-70 _bg-white no-underline underline-hover" href="/en/articles/2021/03/18/geor-j01.html" style="transition:color 0.5s">
                 <span class="">
                  Eight dead in Atlanta-area massage parlor shootings, including six women of Asian-American descent
                 </span>
                </a>
               </h2>

                <span class="">

                  Je Suis Karl
                 </em>

                 </em>

               </em>
               deals with the emergence in Germany and throughout Europe of ultra-right movements.

               </em>
               takes place in a classroom where the students come from nine different countries.

                <a class="black _hover-black-70 _bg-white no-underline underline-hover" href="/en/articles/2021/03/18/hous-m18.html" style="transition:color 0.5s">
                 <span class="">
                  <em>
                   His House
                  </em>
                  : The ghosts of an African civil war
                 </span>
                </a>

                </em>

               <h2 class="_balance-text avenir f6 lh-title measure ma0">

                   Bad Luck Banging or Loony Porn
                  </em>
                  : Biting satire against obscene conditions in capitalist society
                 </span>
                </a>
               </h2>
              </div>

             <div class="black-50 pb3 _bb b--black-10 mt2 _mt0-m">

      <section class="bg-black-05 pv3 pt4-m mt4 ph3 ph4-m" data-content-name="Frontpage ad to /en/articles/2021/02/14/agel-f14.html" data-content-piece="/en" data-track-content="true">
       <div class="mw6 mw-75rem-m center pa2 cf flex-m items-center">
        <div class="w-100 w-40-m w-50-l">
         <div class="center">
          <div>
           <figure class="relative ma0 overflow-hidden">
            <div class="relative overflow-hidden">
             <img class="db relative center" src="https://www.wsws.org/asset/917c09e2-64c4-49fe-a5c1-72b87a5be7af?rendition=image1280"/>
            </div>
           </figure>
          </div>
         </div>
        </div>
        <div class="w-100 pl4-m pl5-l mt0-m mt2 w-60-m w-50-l">
         <div class="db f3 f2-l b -ttu lh-title ma0 mt2 georgia">
          <span type="text-line">
           Sylvia Ageloff and the assassination of Leon Trotsky
          </span>
         </div>
         <div class="helvetica f6 f5-l i black-70 lh-title mt3">
          <span type="text-line">
           With David North and Eric London
          </span>
         </div>
         <div class="avenir f5 f4-l black-70 lh-title mt3">
          <div type="text-block">
           <p>
            North and London discussed the significance of the latest revelations of the the Security and the Fourth International investigation into Trotsky’s assassination.
           </p>
          </div>
         </div>
         <div class="tc tl-m">
          <div class="b white bg-black dib ph3 pv3 avenir tracked-half grow ttu f6 f5-l bw1 bn br2 no-underline mt3">
           Watch the video
          </div>
         </div>
        </div>
       </div>
      </section>
     </a>
     <section class="custom-topic mt3 mt4-ns mt5-xl ph3 ph4-m" style="background:#fff">
      <div class="mw6 _mw9-m mw-75rem-m center">
       <div class="dn-ns">
        <div class="bb b--black-10 nl3 nl0-ns nr3 nr0-ns">
        </div>
        <div class="bg-black-05 bb bw1 nl3 nl0-ns nr3 nr0-ns" style='background-image:url("/static/img/border_diagonal.png");background-repeat:repeat;background-position:0px top'>
         <div class="pb3 bg-white-70">
         </div>
        </div>
       </div>
       <div class="ph3 ph0-ns nl3 nl0-ns nr3 nr0-ns _ph4-m bb b--black-10 bn-ns mb3 mb0-m">
        <div class="dn db-ns dn-m bt bw1 mb2">
        </div>
        <div class="">
         <div class="w-100 bt-m bw2">
         </div>
        </div>
        <div class="relative cf avenir ph2 ph0-ns">
         <div class="" style="max-width:80%">
          <div class="dib pt3 pb3 pt0-ns pb3-ns pt3-m pb4-m _bt bw2">
           <a class="dib f7 f4-m f3-m f3-l b black lh-title ttu tracked-half no-underline pointer _pt3 _bt bw3" href="/en/topics/site_area/science">
            Science
           </a>
           <ul class="dn db-m list pl0 ma0">
            <li class="dib avenir mr3">
             <a class="dib f6 black lh-title _hover-black-70 pt2 no-underline underline-hover" href="/en/topics/scienceCategory/biology">
              Biology and evolution
             </a>
            </li>
            <li class="dib avenir mr3">

              <h2 class="balance-text avenir f4 f4-ns f3-l lh-title measure ma0 center">
               <a class="black _hover-black-70 _bg-white no-underline underline-hover" href="/en/articles/2021/03/17/dino-m17.html" style="transition:color 0.5s">
                <span class="">
                 Dinosaur fossil found sitting on eggs in a nest reveals well-developed parental care
                </span>
               </a>
              </h2>
              <p class="balance-text avenir f6 lh-short lh-copy-ns measure mv3 center">
               The fossil, dating to 70 million years ago, consists of the partially preserved remains of an oviraptorosaur, a feathered, theropod dinosaur lineage tangentially related to those that eventually gave rise to modern birds.
              </p>

              <div class="fr w-40 ml3 mb3">
               <div class="w-100 aspect-ratio aspect-ratio--16x9">
                <a class="pointer" href="/en/articles/2021/03/16/ups-m16.html">
                 <figure class="aspect-ratio--object bg-black ma0 overflow-hidden">
                  <img class="db h-100 center" loading="lazy" src="https://www.wsws.org/asset/e07b1144-534c-4d26-97c5-cfd0084d8147?rendition=image640"/>
                 </figure>
                </a>
               </div>
              </div>
              <div class="_pr3 _w-two-thirds-ns">
               <h2 class="_balance-text avenir lh-title measure ma0 f5 f4-m _f5-ns">
                <a class="black _hover-black-70 _bg-white no-underline underline-hover" href="/en/articles/2021/03/16/ups-m16.html" style="transition:color 0.5s">
                 <span class="">
                  Teamsters union files lawsuit against UPS Worldport in Kentucky over unsafe conditions
                 </span>
                </a>
               </h2>
               <p class="_balance-text avenir f6 lh-short lh-copy-ns measure-wide mv3">
                IBT Local 2727 cites “serious, chronic sanitary concerns” that put flight crew workers in a deadly work environment. However, these conditions were enforced by the Teamsters union itself over the past year.
               </p>
              </div>
             </div>
             <div class="black-50 pb3 _bb b--black-10 mt2 mt0-m">
              <span class="avenir f7 lh-title date">

              <h2 class="balance-text avenir f4 f4-ns f3-l lh-title measure ma0 center">
               <a class="black _hover-black-70 _bg-white no-underline underline-hover" href="/en/articles/2021/03/15/twih-m15.html" style="transition:color 0.5s">
                <span class="">
                 This week in history: March 15-21
                </span>
               </a>
              </h2>
              <p class="balance-text avenir f6 lh-short lh-copy-ns measure mv3 center">
               25 years ago: Canadian police attack striking government workersOn March 18, 1996, riot police mounted a brutal attack on striking Ontario government workers, acting on orders from Ontario’s Tory government. One picketer was knocked unconscious and three more were hospitalized after police clubbed and shoved their way through a picket line outside the Ontario Legislature.
              </p>

              <div class="_pr3 _w-two-thirds-ns">
               <h2 class="_balance-text avenir lh-title measure ma0 f5 f4-m _f5-ns">
                <a class="black _hover-black-70 _bg-white no-underline underline-hover" href="/en/articles/2021/03/05/pers-m05.html" style="transition:color 0.5s">
                 <span class="">

                 </span>
                </a>
               </h2>
               <p class="_balance-text avenir f6 lh-short lh-copy-ns measure-wide mv3">

              </figure>
             </a>
             <div class="relative pv3 ph3 tc">
              <h2 class="balance-text avenir f4 f4-ns f3-l lh-title measure ma0 center">
               <a class="black _hover-black-70 _bg-white no-underline underline-hover" href="/en/articles/2021/03/08/luxe-m08.html" style="transition:color 0.5s">
                <span class="">
                 150 years since the birth of Rosa Luxemburg
                </span>
               </a>
              </h2>
              <p class="balance-text avenir f6 lh-short lh-copy-ns measure mv3 center">
               The meeting examined Luxemburg’s role as a Marxist theoretician and political leader, and discussed the significance of her legacy to the contemporary struggle to build a Marxist leadership.
              </p>
             </div>
            </div>
            <div class="black-50 pb3 _bb b--black-10 tc">
             <span class="avenir f7 lh-title date">
              <span>
               Peter Schwarz, Ulrich Rippert, David North, Johannes Stern
              </span>
              <span class="dib mh1">
               •
              </span>
              <span class="dib">
               <time datetime="2021-03-07T22:22:56.000Z">
                7 March 2021
               </time>
              </span>
             </span>
            </div>
           </article>
          </div>
          <div class="w-100 w-two-thirds-l flex-m bt bt-0-l bl-l b--black-10 pt3 pt0-l pl3-l pl4-xxl mt3 mt0-l">
           <div class="w-100 w-two-thirds-m pr3-m pr4-xxl">
            <article class="cf pt3 pt0-ns bt bn-ns b--black-10">
             <div class="_flex-ns _flex-row-reverse-ns">
              <div class="fr w-40 ml3 mb3">
               <div class="w-100 aspect-ratio aspect-ratio--16x9">
                <a class="pointer" href="/en/articles/2021/02/14/agel-f14.html">
                 <figure class="aspect-ratio--object bg-black ma0 overflow-hidden">
                  <img class="db h-100 center" loading="lazy" src="https://www.wsws.org/asset/917c09e2-64c4-49fe-a5c1-72b87a5be7af?rendition=image640"/>
                 </figure>
                </a>
               </div>
              </div>
              <div class="_pr3 _w-two-thirds-ns">
               <h4 class="_balance-text avenir f6 normal black-60 lh-title ma0 mb2 truncate">
                <span class="pv1">
                 WSWS online Q&amp;A with David North and Eric London
                </span>
               </h4>
               <h2 class="_balance-text avenir lh-title measure ma0 f5 f4-m _f5-ns">
                <a class="black _hover-black-70 _bg-white no-underline underline-hover" href="/en/articles/2021/02/14/agel-f14.html" style="transition:color 0.5s">
                 <span class="">
                  Sylvia Ageloff and the assassination of Leon Trotsky
                 </span>
                </a>
               </h2>
               <p class="_balance-text avenir f6 lh-short lh-copy-ns measure-wide mv3">
                David North and Eric London speak on the significance of the latest revelations, in the context of the decades-long
                <em>
                 Security and the Fourth International
                </em>
                investigation by the ICFI into Trotsky’s assassination by Stalin’s GPU.
               </p>
              </div>
             </div>
             <div class="black-50 pb3 _bb b--black-10 mt2 mt0-m">
              <span class="avenir f7 lh-title date">
               <span>
                David North, Eric London
               </span>
               <span class="dib mh1">
                •
               </span>
               <span class="dib">
                <time datetime="2021-02-14T22:17:59.000Z">
                 14 February 2021
                </time>
               </span>
              </span>
             </div>
            </article>
            <article class="cf pt3 bt b--black-10">
             <div class="_flex-ns _flex-row-reverse-ns">
              <div class="fr w-40 ml3 mb3">
               <div class="w-100 aspect-ratio aspect-ratio--16x9">

                 </figure>
                </a>
               </div>
              </div>
              <div class="_pr3 _w-two-thirds-ns">
               <h2 class="_balance-text avenir lh-title measure ma0 f5 f4-m _f5-ns">
                <a class="black _hover-black-70 _bg-white no-underline underline-hover" href="/en/articles/2021/01/19/dnor-j19.html" style="transition:color 0.5s">
                 <span class="">
                  The Trump coup and the rise of fascism: Where is America going?
                 </span>
                </a>
               </h2>
               <p class="_balance-text avenir f6 lh-short lh-copy-ns measure-wide mv3">

                <em>
                 World Socialist Web Site
                </em>
                and national chairman of the Socialist Equality Party (US), in opening an online discussion held January 17 on the significance of the fascist assault on the Capitol in Washington D.C. on January 6, 2021.

            <article class="mt3 mt0-m pt3 pt0-m bt bn-m b--black-10" styyle="[object Object]">
             <div class="relative">

     <section class="custom-topic mt3 mt4-ns mt5-xl ph3 ph4-m" style="background:#fff">
      <div class="mw6 _mw9-m mw-75rem-m center">
       <div class="dn-ns">
        <div class="bb b--black-10 nl3 nl0-ns nr3 nr0-ns">
        </div>
        <div class="bg-black-05 bb bw1 nl3 nl0-ns nr3 nr0-ns" style='background-image:url("/static/img/border_diagonal.png");background-repeat:repeat;background-position:0px top'>
         <div class="pb3 bg-white-70">
         </div>
        </div>
       </div>
       <div class="ph3 ph0-ns nl3 nl0-ns nr3 nr0-ns _ph4-m bb b--black-10 bn-ns mb3 mb0-m">
        <div class="dn db-ns dn-m bt bw1 mb2">
        </div>
        <div class="">
         <div class="w-100 bt-m bw2">
         </div>
        </div>
        <div class="relative cf avenir ph2 ph0-ns">
         <div class="" style="max-width:80%">
          <div class="dib pt3 pb3 pt0-ns pb3-ns pt3-m pb4-m _bt bw2">
           <a class="dib f7 f4-m f3-m f3-l b black lh-title ttu tracked-half no-underline pointer _pt3 _bt bw3" href="/en/special/pages/iysse/about.html">
            Youth and Students
           </a>
          </div>
         </div>
         <a class="dib absolute top-0 right-0 _right-1-ns f7 b black-60 lh-solid ttu tracked-half hover-black-70 mh3-m mt3 mt0-ns mt3-m no-underline pointer tr">
          <span class="dib v-mid">
          </span>
          <span class="dib v-mid">
           <svg id="Layer_1" style="width:1.5em;fill:currentColor;enable-background:new 0 0 48 48" version="1.1" viewbox="0 0 48 48" x="0px" xml:space="preserve" xmlns="http://www.w3.org/2000/svg" xmlns:xlink="http://www.w3.org/1999/xlink" y="0px">
            <g id="chevron-up">
             <path d="M34.492,27.324L30.816,31L24,24.184l-6.821,6.812l-3.672-3.672L24,16.83L34.492,27.324z">
             </path>
            </g>
           </svg>
          </span>
         </a>
        </div>
       </div>
       <div class="bb b--black-10 pb4 _ph3 _ph0-ns _ph4-m">
        <div class="pa2 pa0-ns">
         <style>
          .topicbox-enter {
                              max-height: 0;
                              overflow: hidden;
                            }
                            .topicbox-enter.topicbox-enter-active {
                              max-height: 50rem;
                              transition: max-height 500ms ease-in;
                            }

                              max-height: 50rem;
                              overflow: hidden;
                            }

                              max-height: 0;
                              transition: max-height 500ms ease-out;
                            }
         </style>

          <div class="w-100 w-third-l pr3-l pr4-xxl mb3 mb0-l">
           <article class="flex flex-column justify-between pb3 pb4-l">

              </figure>
             </a>
             <div class="relative pv3 ph3 tc">
              <h2 class="balance-text avenir f4 f4-ns f3-l lh-title measure ma0 center">
               <a class="black _hover-black-70 _bg-white no-underline underline-hover" href="/en/articles/2021/03/03/appa-m03.html" style="transition:color 0.5s">
                <span class="">
                 International Youth and Students for Social Equality (US) establishes new club at Appalachian State University
                </span>
               </a>
              </h2>
              <p class="balance-text avenir f6 lh-short lh-copy-ns measure mv3 center">
               The IYSSE at ASU is working to bring a socialist perspective to the students and youth at the college and in the surrounding area, and, to turn them to the working class in the region.
              </p>
             </div>

            <div class="black-50 pb3 _bb b--black-10 tc">

      <div class="mw6 _mw9-m mw-75rem-m center">
       <div class="dn-ns">
        <div class="bb b--black-10 nl3 nl0-ns nr3 nr0-ns">
        </div>
        <div class="bg-black-05 bb bw1 nl3 nl0-ns nr3 nr0-ns" style='background-image:url("/static/img/border_diagonal.png");background-repeat:repeat;background-position:0px top'>
         <div class="pb3 bg-white-70">
         </div>
        </div>
       </div>
       <div class="ph3 ph0-ns nl3 nl0-ns nr3 nr0-ns _ph4-m bb b--black-10 bn-ns mb3 mb0-m">
        <div class="dn db-ns dn-m bt bw1 mb2">
        </div>
        <div class="">
         <div class="w-100 bt-m bw2">
         </div>
        </div>
        <div class="relative cf avenir ph2 ph0-ns">
         <div class="" style="max-width:80%">
          <div class="dib pt3 pb3 pt0-ns pb3-ns pt3-m pb4-m _bt bw2">
           <a class="dib f7 f4-m f3-m f3-l b black lh-title ttu tracked-half no-underline pointer _pt3 _bt bw3" href="/en/topics/mediaCategory/google-censorship">
            Internet Censorship
           </a>
          </div>
         </div>
         <a class="dib absolute top-0 right-0 _right-1-ns f7 b black-60 lh-solid ttu tracked-half hover-black-70 mh3-m mt3 mt0-ns mt3-m no-underline pointer tr">
          <span class="dib v-mid">
          </span>
          <span class="dib v-mid">
           <svg id="Layer_1" style="width:1.5em;fill:currentColor;enable-background:new 0 0 48 48" version="1.1" viewbox="0 0 48 48" x="0px" xml:space="preserve" xmlns="http://www.w3.org/2000/svg" xmlns:xlink="http://www.w3.org/1999/xlink" y="0px">
            <g id="chevron-up">
             <path d="M34.492,27.324L30.816,31L24,24.184l-6.821,6.812l-3.672-3.672L24,16.83L34.492,27.324z">
             </path>
            </g>
           </svg>
          </span>
         </a>
        </div>
       </div>
       <div class="bb b--black-10 pb4 _ph3 _ph0-ns _ph4-m">
        <div class="pa2 pa0-ns">
         <style>
          .topicbox-enter {
                              max-height: 0;
                              overflow: hidden;
                            }
                            .topicbox-enter.topicbox-enter-active {
                              max-height: 50rem;
                              transition: max-height 500ms ease-in;
                            }
                            .topicbox-exit {
                              max-height: 50rem;
                              overflow: hidden;
                            }
                            .topicbox-exit.topicbox-exit-active {
                              max-height: 0;
                              transition: max-height 500ms ease-out;
                            }
         </style>
         <div class="flex-l">
          <div class="w-100 w-third-l pr3-l pr4-xxl mb3 mb0-l">
           <article class="flex flex-column justify-between pb3 pb4-l">
            <div class="relative">
             <a class="pointer" href="/en/articles/2021/02/23/face-f23.html">
              <figure class="relative ma0 mb3 aspect-ratio aspect-ratio--16x9">
               <div class="aspect-ratio--object bg-black overflow-hidden">
                <img class="db h-100 center" loading="lazy" src="https://www.wsws.org/asset/d05e1de8-d994-4d9a-b9ea-7faa0df699e4?rendition=image1280"/>
               </div>
              </figure>
             </a>
             <div class="relative pv3 ph3 tc">
              <h2 class="balance-text avenir f4 f4-ns f3-l lh-title measure ma0 center">
               <a class="black _hover-black-70 _bg-white no-underline underline-hover" href="/en/articles/2021/02/23/face-f23.html" style="transition:color 0.5s">
                <span class="">
                 Workers and youth speak out against Facebook’s Australian news ban and corporate media cash grab
                </span>
               </a>
              </h2>
              <p class="balance-text avenir f6 lh-short lh-copy-ns measure mv3 center">
               “The creation and distribution of news is controlled by a few corporations, ruthless in promoting their class interests.”
              </p>
             </div>
            </div>
            <div class="black-50 pb3 _bb b--black-10 tc">
             <span class="avenir f7 lh-title date">
              <span>
               Our reporters
              </span>
              <span class="dib mh1">
               •
              </span>
              <span class="dib">
               <time datetime="2021-02-23T03:55:05.000Z">
                22 February 2021
               </time>
              </span>
             </span>
            </div>
           </article>
          </div>
          <div class="w-100 w-two-thirds-l flex-m bt bt-0-l bl-l b--black-10 pt3 pt0-l pl3-l pl4-xxl mt3 mt0-l">
           <div class="w-100 w-two-thirds-m pr3-m pr4-xxl">
            <article class="cf pt3 pt0-ns bt bn-ns b--black-10">
             <div class="_flex-ns _flex-row-reverse-ns">
              <div class="fr w-40 ml3 mb3">
               <div class="w-100 aspect-ratio aspect-ratio--16x9">
                <a class="pointer" href="/en/articles/2021/02/22/crew-f22.html">
                 <figure class="aspect-ratio--object bg-black ma0 overflow-hidden">
                  <img class="db h-100 center" loading="lazy" src="https://www.wsws.org/asset/9eef12f6-8930-48a8-a051-bc9cc8e92cf6?rendition=image640"/>
                 </figure>
                </a>
               </div>
              </div>
              <div class="_pr3 _w-two-thirds-ns">
               <h2 class="_balance-text avenir lh-title measure ma0 f5 f4-m _f5-ns">
                <a class="black _hover-black-70 _bg-white no-underline underline-hover" href="/en/articles/2021/02/22/crew-f22.html" style="transition:color 0.5s">
                 <span class="">
                  Facebook shuts down group with 90,000 cruise ship crew members
                 </span>
                </a>
               </h2>
               <p class="_balance-text avenir f6 lh-short lh-copy-ns measure-wide mv3">
                On Friday, Facebook removed without explanation a group with 90,000 members who work in the international cruise ship industry.
               </p>
              </div>
             </div>
             <div class="black-50 pb3 _bb b--black-10 mt2 mt0-m">

             </div>
            </article>
            <article class="cf pt3 bt b--black-10">
             <div class="_flex-ns _flex-row-reverse-ns">
              <div class="fr w-40 ml3 mb3">
               <div class="w-100 aspect-ratio aspect-ratio--16x9">

                 </figure>
                </a>
               </div>
              </div>
              <div class="_pr3 _w-two-thirds-ns">
               <h2 class="_balance-text avenir lh-title measure ma0 f5 f4-m _f5-ns">
                <a class="black _hover-black-70 _bg-white no-underline underline-hover" href="/en/articles/2021/02/11/face-f11.html" style="transition:color 0.5s">
                 <span class="">
                  Facebook moves forward with “depoliticization” of News Feed
                 </span>
                </a>
               </h2>
               <p class="_balance-text avenir f6 lh-short lh-copy-ns measure-wide mv3">
                Following up on the remarks of CEO Mark Zuckerberg two weeks ago, Facebook has issued an official statement spelling out how it will move forward with plans to reduce political content on its social media platform.
               </p>
              </div>
             </div>

            <article class="cf pt3 bt b--black-10">
             <div class="_flex-ns _flex-row-reverse-ns">

                  <img class="db h-100 center" loading="lazy" src="https://www.wsws.org/asset/1ab94a0f-e81c-42cb-b779-bcd9390d7c80?rendition=image640"/>
                 </figure>
                </a>
               </div>
              </div>
              <div class="_pr3 _w-two-thirds-ns">
               <h2 class="_balance-text avenir lh-title measure ma0 f5 f4-m _f5-ns">
                <a class="black _hover-black-70 _bg-white no-underline underline-hover" href="/en/articles/2021/02/01/jadc-f01.html" style="transition:color 0.5s">
                 <span class="">
                  Emmy Butlin and Maxine Walker of the UK Committee to Defend Julian Assange oppose Facebook censorship of the Socialist Equality Party/IYSSE
                 </span>
                </a>
               </h2>
               <p class="_balance-text avenir f6 lh-short lh-copy-ns measure-wide mv3">
                The WSWS has been sent letters from Emmy Butlin and Maxine Walker, of the Committee to Defend Julian Assange (JADC) in opposition to the censorship of the World Socialist Web Site and Socialist Equality Parties by Facebook.
               </p>
              </div>

        </div>
        <div class="">
         <div class="w-100 bt-m bw2">
         </div>
        </div>
        <div class="relative cf avenir ph2 ph0-ns">
         <div class="" style="max-width:80%">
          <div class="dib pt3 pb3 pt0-ns pb3-ns pt3-m pb4-m _bt bw2">
           <a class="dib f7 f4-m f3-m f3-l b black lh-title ttu tracked-half no-underline pointer _pt3 _bt bw3" href="/en/topics/event/1619">
            The New York Times’ 1619 Project
           </a>
          </div>
         </div>
         <a class="dib absolute top-0 right-0 _right-1-ns f7 b black-60 lh-solid ttu tracked-half hover-black-70 mh3-m mt3 mt0-ns mt3-m no-underline pointer tr">
          <span class="dib v-mid">
          </span>
          <span class="dib v-mid">
           <svg id="Layer_1" style="width:1.5em;fill:currentColor;enable-background:new 0 0 48 48" version="1.1" viewbox="0 0 48 48" x="0px" xml:space="preserve" xmlns="http://www.w3.org/2000/svg" xmlns:xlink="http://www.w3.org/1999/xlink" y="0px">
            <g id="chevron-up">

            </g>
           </svg>
          </span>
         </a>
        </div>
       </div>
       <div class="bb b--black-10 pb4 _ph3 _ph0-ns _ph4-m">

            <div class="relative">

             <div class="relative pv3 ph3 tc">
              <h2 class="balance-text avenir f4 f4-ns f3-l lh-title measure ma0 center">
               <a class="black _hover-black-70 _bg-white no-underline underline-hover" href="/en/articles/2021/02/16/repu-f16.html" style="transition:color 0.5s">
                <span class="">
                 Republican state legislators move to ban the New York Times’ 1619 Project from schools
                </span>
               </a>
              </h2>
              <p class="balance-text avenir f6 lh-short lh-copy-ns measure mv3 center">
               Republican lawmakers, taking advantage of the racialist falsifications of the 1619 Project, are seeking to promote their own backward and chauvinistic version of US history.
              </p>
             </div>
            </div>

            <article class="cf pt3 pt0-ns bt bn-ns b--black-10">
             <div class="_flex-ns _flex-row-reverse-ns">
              <div class="fr w-40 ml3 mb3">
               <div class="w-100 aspect-ratio aspect-ratio--16x9">

                 </figure>
                </a>
               </div>
              </div>
              <div class="_pr3 _w-two-thirds-ns">
               <h2 class="_balance-text avenir lh-title measure ma0 f5 f4-m _f5-ns">
                <a class="black _hover-black-70 _bg-white no-underline underline-hover" href="/en/articles/2021/01/30/1776-j30.html" style="transition:color 0.5s">
                 <span class="">
                  The Trump Administration’s 1776 Report: The far-right attempts to seize opening from the 1619 Project
                 </span>
                </a>
               </h2>
               <p class="_balance-text avenir f6 lh-short lh-copy-ns measure-wide mv3">
                Attacking the
                <em>
                 New York Times
                </em>
                ’ 1619 Project where it is weakest, the Trump Administration’s “1776 Report” responds to the controversy with its own brand of flag-waving “America First” demagoguery.
               </p>
              </div>
             </div>

            <article class="cf pt3 bt b--black-10">
             <div class="_flex-ns _flex-row-reverse-ns">

                 </figure>
                </a>
               </div>
              </div>
              <div class="_pr3 _w-two-thirds-ns">
               <h2 class="_balance-text avenir lh-title measure ma0 f5 f4-m _f5-ns">
                <a class="black _hover-black-70 _bg-white no-underline underline-hover" href="/en/articles/2021/01/21/glob-j21.html" style="transition:color 0.5s">
                 <span class="">
                  A politically motivated smear: Canada’s Globe and Mail blames “Marxists” for discredited racialist 1619 Project
                 </span>
                </a>
               </h2>
               <p class="_balance-text avenir f6 lh-short lh-copy-ns measure-wide mv3">

               </p>

              <div class="_pr3 _w-two-thirds-ns">
               <h2 class="_balance-text avenir lh-title measure ma0 f5 f4-m _f5-ns">
                <a class="black _hover-black-70 _bg-white no-underline underline-hover" href="/en/articles/2020/12/23/jhop-d23.html" style="transition:color 0.5s">
                 <span class="">

                 </span>
                </a>
               </h2>
               <p class="_balance-text avenir f6 lh-short lh-copy-ns measure-wide mv3">

               </p>

              <div class="relative">
               <h2 class="_balance-text avenir f6 lh-title measure ma0">

             <div class="relative">
              <div class="relative">
               <h2 class="_balance-text avenir f6 lh-title measure ma0">
                <a class="black _hover-black-70 _bg-white no-underline underline-hover" href="/en/articles/2020/11/09/dako-n09.html" style="transition:color 0.5s">

     <a class="no-underline pointer" href="/en/special/pages/ten-years-egyptian-revolution.html">
      <section class="bg-black-05 pv3 pt4-m mt4 ph3 ph4-m" data-content-name="Frontpage ad to /en/special/pages/ten-years-egyptian-revolution.html" data-content-piece="/en" data-track-content="true">
       <div class="mw6 mw-75rem-m center pa2 cf flex-m items-center">
        <div class="w-100 w-40-m w-40-l">
         <div class="center">
          <div>
           <figure class="relative ma0 overflow-hidden">
            <div class="relative overflow-hidden">
             <img class="db relative center" src="https://www.wsws.org/asset/0a548210-8658-4432-9920-de06d9aca814?rendition=image1280"/>
            </div>
           </figure>
          </div>
         </div>
        </div>
        <div class="w-100 pl4-m pl5-l mt0-m mt2 w-60-m w-60-l">
         <div class="db f3 f2-l b -ttu lh-title ma0 mt2 georgia">
          <span type="text-line">
           Ten years since the Egyptian Revolution
          </span>
         </div>
         <div class="avenir f5 f4-l black-70 lh-title mt3">
          <div type="text-block">
           <p>
            To mark the anniversary of the 2011 revolution in Egypt, we present a selection of key statements and analyses produced by the WSWS in the course of the events of that year and their aftermath.
           </p>
          </div>
         </div>

     <section class="custom-topic mt3 mt4-ns mt5-xl ph3 ph4-m" style="background:#fff">
      <div class="mw6 _mw9-m mw-75rem-m center">
       <div class="dn-ns">
        <div class="bb b--black-10 nl3 nl0-ns nr3 nr0-ns">
        </div>
        <div class="bg-black-05 bb bw1 nl3 nl0-ns nr3 nr0-ns" style='background-image:url("/static/img/border_diagonal.png");background-repeat:repeat;background-position:0px top'>
         <div class="pb3 bg-white-70">
         </div>
        </div>
       </div>
       <div class="ph3 ph0-ns nl3 nl0-ns nr3 nr0-ns _ph4-m bb b--black-10 bn-ns mb3 mb0-m">
        <div class="dn db-ns dn-m bt bw1 mb2">
        </div>
        <div class="">
         <div class="w-100 bt-m bw2">
         </div>
        </div>
        <div class="relative cf avenir ph2 ph0-ns">
         <div class="" style="max-width:80%">
          <div class="dib pt3 pb3 pt0-ns pb3-ns pt3-m pb4-m _bt bw2">
           <a class="dib f7 f4-m f3-m f3-l b black lh-title ttu tracked-half no-underline pointer _pt3 _bt bw3" href="/en/topics/event/joseph-scalice-philippines">
            Academic Joseph Scalice’s exposure of the Philippine Maoists
           </a>
          </div>
         </div>
         <a class="dib absolute top-0 right-0 _right-1-ns f7 b black-60 lh-solid ttu tracked-half hover-black-70 mh3-m mt3 mt0-ns mt3-m no-underline pointer tr">
          <span class="dib v-mid">
          </span>
          <span class="dib v-mid">
           <svg id="Layer_1" style="width:1.5em;fill:currentColor;enable-background:new 0 0 48 48" version="1.1" viewbox="0 0 48 48" x="0px" xml:space="preserve" xmlns="http://www.w3.org/2000/svg" xmlns:xlink="http://www.w3.org/1999/xlink" y="0px">
            <g id="chevron-up">

            </g>

          </span>
         </a>
        </div>
       </div>
       <div class="bb b--black-10 pb4 _ph3 _ph0-ns _ph4-m">
        <div class="pa2 pa0-ns">

          <div class="w-100 w-third-l pr3-l pr4-xxl mb3 mb0-l">
           <article class="flex flex-column justify-between pb3 pb4-l">
            <div class="relative">
             <a class="pointer" href="/en/articles/2021/03/06/josc-m06.html">
              <figure class="relative ma0 mb3 aspect-ratio aspect-ratio--16x9">
               <div class="aspect-ratio--object bg-black overflow-hidden">
                <img class="db h-100 center" loading="lazy" src="https://www.wsws.org/asset/d106603d-a71c-4a9d-9a62-f65963dc4497?rendition=image1280"/>
               </div>
              </figure>
             </a>
             <div class="relative pv3 ph3 tc">
              <h2 class="balance-text avenir f4 f4-ns f3-l lh-title measure ma0 center">
               <a class="black _hover-black-70 _bg-white no-underline underline-hover" href="/en/articles/2021/03/06/josc-m06.html" style="transition:color 0.5s">
                <span class="">
                 Watch lecture video “Three Grenades in August: Fifty Years since the Bombing of Plaza Miranda in the Philippines”—another devastating exposure of Stalinism
                </span>
               </a>
              </h2>
              <p class="balance-text avenir f6 lh-short lh-copy-ns measure mv3 center">
               Scalice demonstrated that the “overwhelming weight of evidence” suggested that the Communist Party of the Philippines was responsible for the bombing and indicted its claims that fascism and martial law are “good for revolution.”
              </p>
             </div>
            </div>
            <div class="black-50 pb3 _bb b--black-10 tc">
             <span class="avenir f7 lh-title date">
              <span>
               our reporter
              </span>
              <span class="dib mh1">

            </div>

          </div>

           <div class="w-100 w-two-thirds-m pr3-m pr4-xxl">
            <article class="cf pt3 pt0-ns bt bn-ns b--black-10">
             <div class="_flex-ns _flex-row-reverse-ns">
              <div class="fr w-40 ml3 mb3">
               <div class="w-100 aspect-ratio aspect-ratio--16x9">
                <a class="pointer" href="/en/articles/2021/03/02/plaz-m02.html">
                 <figure class="aspect-ratio--object bg-black ma0 overflow-hidden">
                  <img class="db h-100 center" loading="lazy" src="https://www.wsws.org/asset/5fc7354e-c719-4bcd-8a65-72d4daf6bf1d?rendition=image640"/>
                 </figure>
                </a>
               </div>
              </div>
              <div class="_pr3 _w-two-thirds-ns">
               <h2 class="_balance-text avenir lh-title measure ma0 f5 f4-m _f5-ns">
                <a class="black _hover-black-70 _bg-white no-underline underline-hover" href="/en/articles/2021/03/02/plaz-m02.html" style="transition:color 0.5s">
                 <span class="">
                  Stalinist CPP attacks Dr. Scalice’s upcoming lecture on the 1971 Plaza Miranda bombing in the Philippines
                 </span>
                </a>
               </h2>
               <p class="_balance-text avenir f6 lh-short lh-copy-ns measure-wide mv3">
                In a desperate bid to turn people away from this week’s lecture, Marco Valbuena, Chief Information Officer of the Communist Party of the Philippines (CPP), has again slandered Scalice as operating on behalf of the CIA.
               </p>
              </div>
             </div>
             <div class="black-50 pb3 _bb b--black-10 mt2 mt0-m">
              <span class="avenir f7 lh-title date">
               <span>

                </time>
               </span>
              </span>
             </div>
            </article>
            <article class="cf pt3 bt b--black-10">
             <div class="_flex-ns _flex-row-reverse-ns">
              <div class="fr w-40 ml3 mb3">
               <div class="w-100 aspect-ratio aspect-ratio--16x9">
                <a class="pointer" href="/en/articles/2021/02/12/scal-f12.html">

                  <img class="db h-100 center" loading="lazy" src="https://www.wsws.org/asset/37bae73b-01a5-49a3-bac1-ef5c748a3b75?rendition=image640"/>
                 </figure>
                </a>
               </div>
              </div>
              <div class="_pr3 _w-two-thirds-ns">
               <h4 class="_balance-text avenir f6 normal black-60 lh-title ma0 mb2 truncate">
                <span class="pv1">
                 “Falsifications and slander are the weapons of Stalinism”
                </span>
               </h4>
               <h2 class="_balance-text avenir lh-title measure ma0 f5 f4-m _f5-ns">
                <a class="black _hover-black-70 _bg-white no-underline underline-hover" href="/en/articles/2021/02/12/scal-f12.html" style="transition:color 0.5s">
                 <span class="">
                  Joseph Scalice responds to Stalinist attacks over Diliman Commune article
                 </span>
                </a>
               </h2>
               <p class="_balance-text avenir f6 lh-short lh-copy-ns measure-wide mv3">
                “The honest assessment of history is the bedrock of revolutionary politics. Falsifications and slander, on the other hand, are the primary weapons of Stalinism.”
               </p>
              </div>
             </div>
             <div class="black-50 pb3 _bb b--black-10 mt2 mt0-m">
              <span class="avenir f7 lh-title date">

            </article>
            <article class="cf pt3 bt b--black-10">
             <div class="_flex-ns _flex-row-reverse-ns">

                 </figure>
                </a>
               </div>
              </div>
              <div class="_pr3 _w-two-thirds-ns">
               <h2 class="_balance-text avenir lh-title measure ma0 f5 f4-m _f5-ns">
                <a class="black _hover-black-70 _bg-white no-underline underline-hover" href="/en/articles/2021/02/11/phil-f11-2.html" style="transition:color 0.5s">
                 <span class="">
                  Historian Joseph Scalice to deliver public lecture on 50th anniversary of Plaza Miranda bombing
                 </span>
                </a>
               </h2>
               <p class="_balance-text avenir f6 lh-short lh-copy-ns measure-wide mv3">
                The bombing marked a critical step toward the imposition of martial law in the Philippines by President Ferdinand Marcos in 1972 and remains one of the most controversial events in the country’s history.
               </p>
              </div>
             </div>

             <div class="relative pv3 ph3 tc">
              <h2 class="balance-text avenir f4 f4-ns f3-l lh-title measure ma0 center">
               <a class="black _hover-black-70 _bg-white no-underline underline-hover" href="/en/articles/2020/10/26/pers-o26.html" style="transition:color 0.5s">
                <span class="">
                 The relaunch of the
                 <em>
                  World Socialist Web Site
                 </em>
                 and the future of socialism
                </span>
               </a>
              </h2>
              <p class="balance-text avenir f6 lh-short lh-copy-ns measure mv3 center">

              </p>

            <article class="cf pt3 pt0-ns bt bn-ns b--black-10">
             <div class="_flex-ns _flex-row-reverse-ns">
              <div class="_pr3 w-100">
               <h2 class="_balance-text avenir lh-title measure ma0 f4">
                <a class="black _hover-black-70 _bg-white no-underline underline-hover" href="/en/articles/2020/11/03/joek-n03.html" style="transition:color 0.5s">
                 <span class="">
                  Closing remarks from SEP national secretary Joseph Kishore
                 </span>
                </a>
               </h2>
               <p class="_balance-text avenir f6 lh-short lh-copy-ns measure-wide mv3">
                The WSWS has exhaustively documented and analyzed the political crisis and historical decay of American democracy.
               </p>

              <div class="_pr3 _w-two-thirds-ns">
               <h2 class="_balance-text avenir lh-title measure ma0 f5 f4-m _f5-ns">
                <a class="black _hover-black-70 _bg-white no-underline underline-hover" href="/en/articles/2020/11/03/wsci-n03.html" style="transition:color 0.5s">
                 <span class="">
                  The approach of the World Socialist Web Site to science
                 </span>
                </a>
               </h2>
               <p class="_balance-text avenir f6 lh-short lh-copy-ns measure-wide mv3">
                The WSWS was the only publication to warn very early on the dangers the working class faced if the coronavirus became a pandemic.
               </p>

            <article class="cf pt3 bt b--black-10">
             <div class="_flex-ns _flex-row-reverse-ns">
              <div class="_pr3 w-100">
               <h2 class="_balance-text avenir lh-title measure ma0 f4">
                <a class="black _hover-black-70 _bg-white no-underline underline-hover" href="/en/articles/2020/11/02/whit-n02.html" style="transition:color 0.5s">
                 <span class="">
                  “The WSWS has not only commented on the struggles of the working class it has been an active participant in them”
                 </span>
                </a>
               </h2>
               <p class="_balance-text avenir f6 lh-short lh-copy-ns measure-wide mv3">
                In the vast archive of the WSWS, the working class will find the most critical lessons from the history of the global class struggle and an international socialist perspective needed to conduct its fight against world capitalism today.
               </p>
              </div>
             </div>
             <div class="black-50 pb3 _bb b--black-10 mt2 mt0-m">
              <span class="avenir f7 lh-title date">
               <span>
                Jerry White
               </span>
               <span class="dib mh1">
                •
               </span>
               <span class="dib nowrap">
                <time datetime="2020-11-02T00:03:00.000Z">
                 1 November 2020
                </time>
               </span>
              </span>
             </div>
            </article>
           </div>
           <div class="w-100 w-third-m pb3 pl3-m pl4-xxl bl-m b--black-10">

     <a class="no-underline pointer" href="/en/special/pages/1990-reunification-germany.html">
      <section class="bg-black-05 pv3 pt4-m mt4 ph3 ph4-m">
       <div class="mw6 mw-75rem-m center pa2 cf flex-l items-center">
        <div class="w-100 w-50-l">
         <div class="center">
          <div>
           <figure class="relative ma0 overflow-hidden">
            <div class="relative overflow-hidden">
             <img class="db relative center" src="https://www.wsws.org/asset/4e690a33-cd48-4df5-8519-5ae3bc0b9c45?rendition=image1280"/>
            </div>
            <figcaption class="db avenir f7 f6-m lh-title black-60 tc pt3 ph3">
            </figcaption>
           </figure>
          </div>
         </div>
        </div>
        <div class="w-100 pl4-m pl5-l mt0-m w-50-l w-50-l">
         <div class="f4 f3-l i lh-title ma0 georgia">
          From the Marxist Library
         </div>
         <div class="db f3 f2-l b -ttu lh-title ma0 mt2 georgia">
          Thirty years since the reunification of Germany
         </div>
         <div class="helvetica f6 f5-l i black-70 lh-title mt3">
         </div>
         <div class="avenir f5 f4-l black-70 lh-title mt3">
          To mark the 30th anniversary of the German reunification, the WSWS is presenting a special exhibit of documents and statements produced by the International Committee of the Fourth International amidst the crisis of Stalinism in the former GDR.
         </div>
        </div>
       </div>
      </section>
     </a>

              <h2 class="balance-text avenir f4 f4-ns f3-l lh-title measure ma0 center">

                </span>
               </a>

              <p class="balance-text avenir f6 lh-short lh-copy-ns measure mv3 center">

                 </span>
                </a>

     <section class="custom-topic mt3 mt4-ns mt5-xl ph3 ph4-m" style="background:#fff">
      <div class="mw6 _mw9-m mw-75rem-m center">
       <div class="dn-ns">
        <div class="bb b--black-10 nl3 nl0-ns nr3 nr0-ns">
        </div>
        <div class="bg-black-05 bb bw1 nl3 nl0-ns nr3 nr0-ns" style='background-image:url("/static/img/border_diagonal.png");background-repeat:repeat;background-position:0px top'>
         <div class="pb3 bg-white-70">
         </div>
        </div>
       </div>
       <div class="ph3 ph0-ns nl3 nl0-ns nr3 nr0-ns _ph4-m bb b--black-10 bn-ns mb3 mb0-m">
        <div class="dn db-ns dn-m bt bw1 mb2">
        </div>
        <div class="">
         <div class="w-100 bt-m bw2">
         </div>
        </div>
        <div class="relative cf avenir ph2 ph0-ns">
         <div class="" style="max-width:80%">
          <div class="dib pt3 pb3 pt0-ns pb3-ns pt3-m pb4-m _bt bw2">
           <a class="dib f7 f4-m f3-m f3-l b black lh-title ttu tracked-half no-underline pointer _pt3 _bt bw3" href="/en/topics/artsCategory/book">
            Book Reviews
           </a>
          </div>
         </div>
         <a class="dib absolute top-0 right-0 _right-1-ns f7 b black-60 lh-solid ttu tracked-half hover-black-70 mh3-m mt3 mt0-ns mt3-m no-underline pointer tr">
          <span class="dib v-mid">
          </span>
          <span class="dib v-mid">
           <svg id="Layer_1" style="width:1.5em;fill:currentColor;enable-background:new 0 0 48 48" version="1.1" viewbox="0 0 48 48" x="0px" xml:space="preserve" xmlns="http://www.w3.org/2000/svg" xmlns:xlink="http://www.w3.org/1999/xlink" y="0px">
            <g id="chevron-up">
             <path d="M34.492,27.324L30.816,31L24,24.184l-6.821,6.812l-3.672-3.672L24,16.83L34.492,27.324z">
             </path>
            </g>
           </svg>
          </span>
         </a>
        </div>
       </div>
       <div class="bb b--black-10 pb4 _ph3 _ph0-ns _ph4-m">
        <div class="pa2 pa0-ns">
         <style>
          .topicbox-enter {
                              max-height: 0;
                              overflow: hidden;
                            }
                            .topicbox-enter.topicbox-enter-active {

                              max-height: 0;
