                            }
         </style>
         <div class="flex-l">
          <div class="w-100 w-third-l pr3-l pr4-xxl mb3 mb0-l">
           <article class="flex flex-column justify-between pb3 pb4-l">
            <div class="relative">
             <a class="pointer" href="/en/articles/2020/10/24/kel1-o24.html">
              <figure class="relative ma0 mb3 aspect-ratio aspect-ratio--16x9">
               <div class="aspect-ratio--object bg-black overflow-hidden">
                <img class="db h-100 center" loading="lazy" src="https://www.wsws.org/asset/253c3b17-29e5-4a14-b8e7-7cc8c1176fe8?rendition=image1280"/>
               </div>
              </figure>
             </a>
             <div class="relative pv3 ph3 tc">
              <h2 class="balance-text avenir f4 f4-ns f3-l lh-title measure ma0 center">
               <a class="black _hover-black-70 _bg-white no-underline underline-hover" href="/en/articles/2020/10/24/kel1-o24.html" style="transition:color 0.5s">
                <span class="">
                 Modern Monetary Theory and the crisis of capitalism: Part one
                </span>
               </a>
              </h2>
              <p class="balance-text avenir f6 lh-short lh-copy-ns measure mv3 center">
               Modern Monetary Theory is the latest in a long line of attempts by “left” theorists to maintain that capitalism can be made to work for society if only outmoded thinking about the monetary system is abandoned.
              </p>
             </div>
            </div>
            <div class="black-50 pb3 _bb b--black-10 tc">
             <span class="avenir f7 lh-title date">
              <span>
               Nick Beams
              </span>
              <span class="dib mh1">
               •
              </span>
              <span class="dib">
               <time datetime="2020-10-24T03:31:38.000Z">
                23 October 2020
               </time>
              </span>
             </span>
            </div>
           </article>
          </div>
          <div class="w-100 w-two-thirds-l flex-m bt bt-0-l bl-l b--black-10 pt3 pt0-l pl3-l pl4-xxl mt3 mt0-l">
           <div class="w-100 w-two-thirds-m pr3-m pr4-xxl">
            <article class="cf pt3 pt0-ns bt bn-ns b--black-10">
             <div class="_flex-ns _flex-row-reverse-ns">
              <div class="fr w-40 ml3 mb3">
               <div class="w-100 aspect-ratio aspect-ratio--16x9">
                <a class="pointer" href="/en/articles/2020/09/17/wilm-s17.html">
                 <figure class="aspect-ratio--object bg-black ma0 overflow-hidden">
                  <img class="db h-100 center" loading="lazy" src="https://www.wsws.org/asset/193db5ef-c94d-419e-81ba-11d1d3f64213?rendition=image640"/>
                 </figure>
                </a>
               </div>
              </div>
              <div class="_pr3 _w-two-thirds-ns">
               <h4 class="_balance-text avenir f6 normal black-60 lh-title ma0 mb2 truncate">
                <span class="pv1">
                 Book Review
                </span>
               </h4>
               <h2 class="_balance-text avenir lh-title measure ma0 f5 f4-m _f5-ns">
                <a class="black _hover-black-70 _bg-white no-underline underline-hover" href="/en/articles/2020/09/17/wilm-s17.html" style="transition:color 0.5s">
                 <span class="">
                  <em>
                   Wilmington’s Lie
                  </em>
                  : The 1898 white supremacist coup in North Carolina
                 </span>
                </a>
               </h2>
               <p class="_balance-text avenir f6 lh-short lh-copy-ns measure-wide mv3">
                The racist massacre in Wilmington was a major turning point in the entrenchment of Jim Crow segregation throughout the South.
               </p>
              </div>
             </div>
             <div class="black-50 pb3 _bb b--black-10 mt2 mt0-m">
              <span class="avenir f7 lh-title date">
               <span>
                Fred Mazelis
               </span>
               <span class="dib mh1">
                •
               </span>
               <span class="dib">
                <time datetime="2020-09-17T05:00:00.000Z">
                 17 September 2020
                </time>
               </span>
              </span>
             </div>
            </article>
            <article class="cf pt3 bt b--black-10">
             <div class="_flex-ns _flex-row-reverse-ns">
              <div class="fr w-40 ml3 mb3">
               <div class="w-100 aspect-ratio aspect-ratio--16x9">
                <a class="pointer" href="/en/articles/2020/09/09/twon-s09.html">
                 <figure class="aspect-ratio--object bg-black ma0 overflow-hidden">
                  <img class="db h-100 center" loading="lazy" src="https://www.wsws.org/asset/e8a7ee8e-96b0-425c-ae2c-d0a1d757de9b?rendition=image640"/>
                 </figure>
                </a>
               </div>
              </div>
              <div class="_pr3 _w-two-thirds-ns">
               <h2 class="_balance-text avenir lh-title measure ma0 f5 f4-m _f5-ns">
                <a class="black _hover-black-70 _bg-white no-underline underline-hover" href="/en/articles/2020/09/09/twon-s09.html" style="transition:color 0.5s">
                 <span class="">
                  Two novellas on the #MeToo issue: Mary Gaitskill’s
                  <em>
                   This is Pleasure
                  </em>
                  and James Lasdun’s
                  <em>
                   Afternoon of a Faun
                  </em>
                 </span>
                </a>
               </h2>
               <p class="_balance-text avenir f6 lh-short lh-copy-ns measure-wide mv3">
                Two recent works of fiction interestingly portray the #MeToo campaign in operation, but don’t criticize (or probe deeply) much of what needs to be criticized.
               </p>
              </div>
             </div>
             <div class="black-50 pb3 _bb b--black-10 mt2 mt0-m">
              <span class="avenir f7 lh-title date">
               <span>
                Sandy English
               </span>
               <span class="dib mh1">
                •
               </span>
               <span class="dib">
                <time datetime="2020-09-09T05:00:00.000Z">
                 9 September 2020
                </time>
               </span>
              </span>
             </div>
            </article>
            <article class="cf pt3 bt b--black-10">
             <div class="_flex-ns _flex-row-reverse-ns">
              <div class="fr w-40 ml3 mb3">
               <div class="w-100 aspect-ratio aspect-ratio--16x9">
                <a class="pointer" href="/en/articles/2020/08/29/kill-a29.html">
                 <figure class="aspect-ratio--object bg-black ma0 overflow-hidden">
                  <img class="db h-100 center" loading="lazy" src="https://www.wsws.org/asset/efed0926-a2c1-4a32-a1ae-02e192cda183?rendition=image640"/>
                 </figure>
                </a>
               </div>
              </div>
              <div class="_pr3 _w-two-thirds-ns">
               <h2 class="_balance-text avenir lh-title measure ma0 f5 f4-m _f5-ns">
                <a class="black _hover-black-70 _bg-white no-underline underline-hover" href="/en/articles/2020/08/29/kill-a29.html" style="transition:color 0.5s">
                 <span class="">
                  <em>
                   The Kill Chain
                  </em>
                  : A new era of world war
                 </span>
                </a>
               </h2>
               <p class="_balance-text avenir f6 lh-short lh-copy-ns measure-wide mv3">
                <em>
                 The Kill Chain
                </em>
                exposes US imperialism’s advanced war preparations against China, with Silicon Valley playing a critical role.
               </p>
              </div>

                 <span class="">

                 </span>

                <em>
                 World Socialist Web Site
                </em>

               </span>
               <span class="dib nowrap">
                <time datetime="2019-09-20T05:00:00.000Z">
                 20 September 2019
                </time>
               </span>
              </span>
             </div>
            </article>
            <article class="cf pt3 bt b--black-10">
             <div class="_flex-ns _flex-row-reverse-ns">
              <div class="fr w-40 ml3 mb3">
               <div class="w-100 aspect-ratio aspect-ratio--16x9">
                <a class="pointer" href="/en/articles/2019/09/25/bgst-s24.html">
                 <figure class="aspect-ratio--object bg-black ma0 overflow-hidden">
                  <img class="db h-100 center" loading="lazy" src="https://www.wsws.org/asset/c77f79a7-d4a4-4885-bc81-64c3f9a697a2?rendition=image640"/>
                 </figure>
                </a>
               </div>
              </div>
              <div class="_pr3 _w-two-thirds-ns">
               <h2 class="_balance-text avenir lh-title measure ma0 f5 f4-m _f5-ns">
                <a class="black _hover-black-70 _bg-white no-underline underline-hover" href="/en/articles/2019/09/25/bgst-s24.html" style="transition:color 0.5s">
                 <span class="">
                  The ICFI and the Crisis of Stalinism
                 </span>
                </a>
               </h2>
               <p class="_balance-text avenir f6 lh-short lh-copy-ns measure-wide mv3">
                This lecture was delivered to the Socialist Equality Party (US) Summer School on July 24, 2019 by Barry Grey, US national editor of the
                <em>
                 World Socialist Web Site
                </em>
                and leading member of the Socialist Equality Party in the US.
               </p>
              </div>
             </div>
             <div class="black-50 pb3 _bb b--black-10 mt2 mt0-m">
              <span class="avenir f7 lh-title date">
               <span>
                Barry Grey
               </span>
               <span class="dib mh1">
                •
               </span>
               <span class="dib nowrap">
                <time datetime="2019-09-25T05:00:00.000Z">
                 25 September 2019
                </time>
               </span>
              </span>
             </div>
            </article>
           </div>
           <div class="w-100 w-third-m pb3 pl3-m pl4-xxl bl-m b--black-10">
            <article class="mt3 mt0-m pt3 pt0-m bt bn-m b--black-10" styyle="[object Object]">

              <div class="relative">
